info.name: Fatbunny Creams for Inkbunny
info.description: A style that gives stories a bit of love, widening the view area, tuning the fonts to Georgia from Times New Roman, and dimming the story background just slightly to remove the searing white effect of a typically white background.
info.additionalInfo:
v16.09.04.02-FX-FTCM release notes:

Holy crap, I've reworked it a bit more to have it function while Inkbunny staff eventually get around to the proper anchors I need. You will need to disable this for non-story entries, until I get those dedicated anchors.

v16.04.02.08-FX-FTCM release notes:

Initial release! Needed to do SOMETHING with the white background thing going on with Inkbunny, so here you go!
